CN.content:

Paragraph: Such a superior device efficiency was attributed to the greatly enhanced exciton dissociation , higher and balanced charge carrier mobilities , and less recombination losses in the active layer of the PffBB-14:PC71BM - based cells.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Such a superior device efficiency was attributed to the greatly enhanced exciton dissociation , higher and balanced charge carrier mobilities , and less recombination losses in the active layer of the PffBB-14:PC71BM - based cells.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| exciton dissociation |
| charge carrier mobilities (higher and balanced) |
| recombination losses |
| efficiency (of the device) |
| active layer (of the PffBB-14:PC71BM - based cells) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| exciton dissociation |
| charge carrier mobilities (higher and balanced) |
| recombination losses (in the active layer) |

Note: "Superior device efficiency" is not a material property and was removed from the table.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Such a superior device efficiency was attributed to the greatly enhanced exciton dissociation , higher and balanced charge carrier mobilities , and less recombination losses in the active layer of the PffBB-14:PC71BM - based cells.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| greatly enhanced exciton dissociation |
| higher charge carrier mobilities |
| balanced charge carrier mobilities |
| less recombination losses |
| in the active layer of the PffBB-14:PC71BM - based cells |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| greatly enhanced exciton dissociation |
| higher charge carrier mobilities (of which "higher" is a comparative adjective describing the degree of the property value) |
| less recombination losses |
| in the active layer of the PffBB-14:PC71BM - based cells |

Therefore, the valid entities that refer to the "Value of material property" are:

* greatly enhanced exciton dissociation
* higher charge carrier mobilities
* less recombination losses
* the active layer of the PffBB-14:PC71BM - based cells (although it's not a material property itself, it's a context that describes the location of the material properties)
